@jaythenerdkid @yrfatfriend If a fat person does actually spend several hundred bucks on an extra seat, the airline apparently often gives the seat away without refunding their money anyway, so why should they have to spend all that extra money just to placate people’s feelings?
@FatActivist I know, it’s so strange. My partner turns 38 soon, I swear he’s been saying “I’m nearly 40” for a decade.
@FatActivist For me personally, 29, but I have a different standard for what counts as “old” with other people. So me at 29 is old. Others at 38? Still young.
